course_title: Freshman Seminar: Spanish: The Function of Feeling
class_notes:
Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only
What are feelings good for? What is the function of feelings in the constitution of ourselves and the organization of our societies? We focus on negative feelings (disgust, revulsion, hate, etc.), with readings drawn from across the Americas and Latin America in particular.
course_description: Freshmen only. In-depth treatment of a topic in language, literature, or culture of the Luso-Hispanic world through readings, frequent writing assignments, and class discussions.
sections: Class Nbr: 2438, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: S. Delgado Moya, Status: Open
